about:
Together with Arie & Jeppe I enjoy living in Amsterdam a lot! 
There is always something to discover and when not feeling like doing anything, our home is a great place to relax. 

Next to Amsterdam and it's venues, I am always curious for new experiences and discoveries, will-not-but-would-love-to live anywhere for a short period of time. Staying in other people's homes comes close to a bit of that experience ;-)   That experience is exactly what we want to share with the ones who stay in our home.

We live close to Amstel River, which I really enjoy. I love strolling alongside the river, taking a boat trip on it or just sit next to it on my own or with family, friends or a book. 

Next to that , enjoying life consists of wining and dining with friends, cooking, windsurfing, reading, working and lots of little things, and....... city trips and holidays are definitely high on the favorite list!

Arie and myself are both self employed (as photographers and corporate lawyer). In September 2014 Jeppe joined and showed to be a perfect fit ;-)
In future we hope to discover lots more together.

review.comments: Dorcas was very respectful guest and took good care of everything. I would welcome him back again! 100% recommended

school: OLV Lyceum Breda, Fotoacademie Amsterdam, VU University Amsterdam, UvA
